Title: Authorizes the county of Nassau assessor to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Chabad of West Hempstead
Summary: Authorizes the county of Nassau assessor to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Chabad of West Hempstead for a portion of the 2022 school taxes, a portion of the 2023 general taxes, all of the 2023-2024 school taxes and all of the 2024 general taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the county of Nassau assessor to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Chabad of West Hempstead
